Key Match Events: Andrés Giménez hit a single to RF (Ground Ball) in the bottom of the 10th inning, scoring J. Ramírez and L. Thomas, and giving the Guardians the lead.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game went into extra innings, with the Guardians ultimately winning 3-2 in the bottom of the 10th inning.
Others: The attendance was 21,707, and the game took 3:04 to complete.
